name: Jump Dash (scalybob)
description:
JUMP DASH puts a new twist on platformer games, with different levels, choice of crazy original characters and cool soundtracks.  The longer you survive, the faster and more difficult it becomes.  The controls are so simple, just tap to jump.  Jump Dash is a platformer suitable for all ages. 

FEATURES:

🌭 Different animated characters to choose from. 🤖
☃️ Unlock more characters the higher you score. 🚀
🎵 Multiple levels with individual themes and music.
🕹️ Simple control.
😲 In-game twists that increase the difficulty the longer you survive.
💯 Share your best scores and compete with friends.

DEVICE/CONTENT INFO:

🔹 Works on phones, tablets and Chromebooks (that support Android).
🔹 Small download size.
🔹 No notifications.
🔹 No in-app purchases.
🔹 No banner adverts distracting you during game play.
🔹 No permissions requested.
🔹 No personal data recorded or used.
🔹 No violent content, bad language or inappropriate adverts.

🆓 Jump Dash is a 100% free platformer and always will be, so download it today and give it a try. 🆓

Please leave a rating in the playstore with your feedback.

If you like this game, please check out the other free games by Scaly Bob.
